event.title: 15 July 2007, a statue of a giant pink doughnut was erected

data.event: On 15 July 2007, a statue of a giant pink doughnut was erected to promote the upcoming movie, The Simpsons Movie.

event.title: destroyed by an arsonist on 25 September 2009

data.event: It was subsequently set alight and destroyed by an arsonist on 25 September 2009.
A tyre painted pink was used as a substitute until it was replaced with a concrete version unveiled on 1 July 2012.
